text: Nemospiza is a genus of African orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Nemospiza conspicillata. It was first described by Eugène Simon in 1903, and is known only from a female found in South Africa. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South Africa Category:Taxa named by Eugène Simon
title: Nemospiza
